title: Q&A: What financial help is available during the coronavirus pandemic?
description: State offering a range of supports to those who have seen their work affected by crisis
content: There are a range of emergency income supports available to people affected by the pandemic. It depends on the situation you are in, whether you are still employed or have lost your job, or whether you have to stay home to self-isolate or to care for someone … [+188 chars]
